abstract: Christopher H. Browne, former managing director of the mutual fund company Tweedy Browne and legendary value investor, died Sunday from a heart attack, the company announced on its Web site.
snippet: Christopher H. Browne, former managing director of the mutual fund company Tweedy Browne and legendary value investor, died Sunday from a heart attack, the company announced on its Web site.
lead_paragraph: Christopher H. Browne, former managing director of the mutual fund company Tweedy Browne and legendary value investor, died Sunday from a heart attack, the company announced on its Web site. He was 62.

headline.main: Christopher H. Browne, Value Investor, Dies
